MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL21 postcode area of Corwen affecting properties in Gweddelwern, Bryn Saith Marchog and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties and we are working as quickly and safely as possible to restore supplies for those customers still off. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an overhead line brought down by a tree near Oror Farm and we now expect supply to be back on by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30am on 30th March 2021.
